about_the_game:
Build your dream farm from the ground up in Moonstone Resort, a charming single-player farming simulation. Start with a small plot of land and transform it into a thriving agricultural empire.

Key Features:

  • Farming: Plant and harvest a variety of crops and expand your fields to maximize your yield. From humble vegetables to bountiful orchards, discover the joys of rural life.

  • Mining: Explore the depths of the local mines in search of valuable ores, gems, and other resources. Help the lost creatures and let them enjoy their freedom.

  • Crafting: Turn raw materials into useful items, tools, and decorations. Craft everything from simple farming implements to complex machinery to improve your efficiency and personalize your farm.

  • Expansion: expand and decorate the hotel, build attractions that attract crowds of tourists
detailed_description:
Build your dream farm from the ground up in Moonstone Resort, a charming single-player farming simulation. Start with a small plot of land and transform it into a thriving agricultural empire.

Key Features:

  • Farming: Plant and harvest a variety of crops and expand your fields to maximize your yield. From humble vegetables to bountiful orchards, discover the joys of rural life.

  • Mining: Explore the depths of the local mines in search of valuable ores, gems, and other resources. Help the lost creatures and let them enjoy their freedom.

  • Crafting: Turn raw materials into useful items, tools, and decorations. Craft everything from simple farming implements to complex machinery to improve your efficiency and personalize your farm.

  • Expansion: expand and decorate the hotel, build attractions that attract crowds of tourists
name: Moonstone Resort

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-7700 or AMD™ Ryzen 5 2500x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 (3GB), Intel® Arc™ A380, or ATI Radeon™ RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-10500 or AMD™ Ryzen 5 3700X
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2060, Intel® Arc™ A770, or ATI Radeon™ RX 5600XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

short_description: Find tranquility in a peaceful farming life while building a cozy hotel for guests. When you're ready for an adventure, explore the depths of the mines, encountering unique creatures and uncovering valuable resources.
